scenes.description: Performance of the song 'I wonder' by Takanashi Kiara, Oozora Subaru, and Hakos Baelz.
Performance of the song '幾億光年' by Tsunomaki Watame, Yukihana Lamy, and Anya Melfissa.

subtitles.original: ...彩りだったニュアンスからは
subtitles.english: ...From the nuances that were once colors

subtitles.original: 淡い 甘い
subtitles.english: Faint, sweet

subtitles.original: 探してた
subtitles.english: I was searching

subtitles.original: 素直なままの君のパレットで
subtitles.english: On your palette, just as you are

subtitles.original: 真実だけ描いていくから
subtitles.english: Because I'll only paint the truth

subtitles.original: 音が止まった
subtitles.english: The sound stopped

subtitles.original: 色が変わった
subtitles.english: The colors changed

subtitles.original: パズルみたいな
subtitles.english: Like a puzzle

subtitles.original: 記憶の欠片
subtitles.english: Fragments of memory

subtitles.original: 誰かが呼んだ
subtitles.english: Someone called out

subtitles.original: 鼓動が鳴った
subtitles.english: A heartbeat rang out

subtitles.original: I wonder
subtitles.english: I wonder

subtitles.original: もう一度さ　声を聞かせてよ
subtitles.english: Let me hear your voice once more

subtitles.original: めくれないままでいる　夏の日のカレンダー
subtitles.english: A calendar from a summer day that remains unturned

subtitles.original: 「ただいま」ってさ　笑ってみせてよ
subtitles.english: Say "I'm home" and show me a smile

subtitles.original: 送り先もわからない　忘れ物ばかりだ
subtitles.english: I only have things left behind with no destination

subtitles.original: 心が壊れる音が聞こえて
subtitles.english: Hearing the sound of my heart breaking

subtitles.original: どれだけ君を愛していたか知って
subtitles.english: Knowing just how much I loved you

subtitles.original: もう二度とは増やせない
subtitles.english: I can't add any more

subtitles.original: 思い出を抱いて生きて
subtitles.english: I'll live on holding our memories

subtitles.original: デイバイデイ
subtitles.english: Day by day

subtitles.original: どんなスピードで追いかけたら
subtitles.english: At what speed must I chase

subtitles.original: また君と巡り逢えるだろう
subtitles.english: To be able to meet you again?

subtitles.original: 寄り添った日々に生きている意味
subtitles.english: The meaning of living in the days we stood together

subtitles.original: くれたのは君なんだよ
subtitles.english: Was given to me by you

subtitles.original: だから
subtitles.english: So

subtitles.original: いつも心で想い続けてる
subtitles.english: I'm always thinking of you in my heart

subtitles.original: まだ僕の声は聞こえてる？
subtitles.english: Can you still hear my voice?

subtitles.original: 止まらない日々　君に会う度
subtitles.english: The days that don't stop, every time I see you

subtitles.original: よく似合う笑み浮かべて待ってて
subtitles.english: Wait for me with that smile that suits you so well

subtitles.original: 言えなかった胸の奥の言葉
subtitles.english: The words deep in my chest I couldn't say

subtitles.original: 今ならありのまま君に渡せる
subtitles.english: Now I can give them to you just as they are

subtitles.original: 囁き合った　おどけられたより
subtitles.english: Rather than whispering or joking around

subtitles.original: 0センチの指先で　渡せた君なでてた
subtitles.english: With my fingertips at 0cm, I was stroking you

subtitles.original: どうしてかな　離れている方が
subtitles.english: I wonder why, when we are apart

subtitles.original: 言葉溢れ出すのは　今さらと笑って
subtitles.english: Words overflow; laughing that it's too late now

subtitles.original: 君だけ見つけた　いつかの流星
subtitles.english: A meteor that only you found back then

subtitles.original: どんな願いを浮かべていたのかな
subtitles.english: I wonder what kind of wish you were thinking of

subtitles.original: あの日君が見上げてた
subtitles.english: On that day you were looking up

subtitles.original: 藍色の先を見つめて
subtitles.english: Staring beyond the indigo

subtitles.original: デイバイデイ
subtitles.english: Day by day

subtitles.original: 幾億光年の距離を越えて
subtitles.english: Crossing the distance of billions of light years

subtitles.original: 輝きを伝う星のように
subtitles.english: Like a star transmitting its radiance

subtitles.original: 変わらない愛　確かな光
subtitles.english: An unchanging love, a steady light

subtitles.original: 届くまで願い続ける
subtitles.english: I'll keep wishing until it reaches you

subtitles.original: だから
subtitles.english: So

subtitles.original: いつか僕ら巡り逢えたなら
subtitles.english: If we can meet again someday

subtitles.original: 輝きの中で待ち合わせよう
subtitles.english: Let's meet within the radiance

subtitles.original: 君が迷子にならないように
subtitles.english: So that you won't get lost

subtitles.original: 瞬きもせず　照らして待ってる
subtitles.english: I'll wait, shining without even blinking

subtitles.original: 消えやしない　君がくれた温もり
subtitles.english: The warmth you gave me will never fade

subtitles.original: 抱きしめ僕は今を生きていくから
subtitles.english: Embracing it, I will live in the present

subtitles.original: 名前を呼ぶよ
subtitles.english: I'll call your name

subtitles.original: 来る日も来る日も
subtitles.english: Day after day

subtitles.original: 絶えず叫ぶよ
subtitles.english: I'll scream it out incessantly

subtitles.original: あのままの二人でいようよ
subtitles.english: Let's stay the two of us just like that

subtitles.original: デイバイデイ
subtitles.english: Day by day

subtitles.original: どんなスピードで追いかけたら
subtitles.english: At what speed must I chase

subtitles.original: また君と巡り逢えるだろう
subtitles.english: To be able to meet you again?

subtitles.original: 分かち合った日々　季節は不意に
subtitles.english: The days we shared; the seasons suddenly

subtitles.original: 君だけを乗せ彼方へ
subtitles.english: Carrying only you far away

subtitles.original: だから
subtitles.english: So
